SELECT B.ORGNZT_NM ORGNZT_NM , A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE KNO_TYPE_CD , A.EXPERT_ID SPE_ID , A.KNWLDG_TY_NM KNO_TYPE_NM , DATE_FORMAT(A.CL_DE,'%Y-%m-%d') CL_YMD , A.KNWLDG_URL KNO_URL , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID FRST_REGISTER_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID LAST_UPDUSR_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM FROM COMTNDAMMAPKNO A, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM B WHERE A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID
AND binary(B.ORGNZT_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND binary(A.KNWLDG_TY_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNDAMMAPKNO A, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM B WHERE A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID
AND binary(B.ORGNZT_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND binary(A.KNWLDG_TY_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE knoTypeCd , A.ORGNZT_ID orgnztId , B.ORGNZT_NM orgnztNm , A.EXPERT_ID speId , A.KNWLDG_TY_NM knoTypeNm , DATE_FORMAT(A.CL_DE,'%Y-%m-%d') clYmd , A.KNWLDG_URL knoUrl , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID frstRegisterId , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') frstRegistPnttm , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID lastUpdusrId , DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') lastUpdusrPnttm FROM COMTNDAMMAPKNO A, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM B WHERE A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = #{knoTypeCd}
